fullDescription.intro: Creates a connection to access a Moodle platform. You need a user with teacher (or administrator) role and provide your login credentials. The connection can be propagated between nodes so that only one connection node is required for the entire workflow.
fullDescription.option: Your username to access the Moodle site
Your password to access the Moodle site

ports.outPort: Moodle Connection to be used in other Moodle nodes.
